title: QFI_Official
author: QFI_Official
content: Here comes QFI token which is being managed by Questra Finance."QUESTRA FINANCE" is based on optimum smart chain ‘Blockchain’ system. Which is a future smart chain providing the solution for all types of blockchain technology.”We are constructing the financial future. Blockchain is the most trusted and fastest growing cryptocurrency firm, providing millions of people across the world with a simple and secure way to access cryptocurrency. Blockchain, the world's most popular and trusted crypto Wallet, is on its way to changing the $14 trillion financial services industry.We believe in the phenomena of decentralisation (from which our slogan " Decentralize The World ") in the wide sense of cultural, political, economic, and technological decentralisation for the common good, as the next evolutionary step in our technosociety.
